summary: The script parses simulation logs to compute the count of women of reproductive age who underwent female sterilisation, broken down by 5‑year age groups and overall totals, for the years 2010 and 2020. It also determines the total female population for those years and stores the results in an Excel workbook used to calibrate contraception intervention multipliers.
business_intent: Provide calibrated demographic and sterilisation statistics to inform and fine‑tune contraception intervention modeling within health policy simulations.
